subject: The Championship Fight
text:
The Championship Fight is a lifetime struggle for all of humanity...  
We are obligated to stand against all indecency and immorality.  
Speak out and move against all unnatural things...  
We don't want evil and the conditions it brings!  
ALLAH can send help to keep us from getting beat...  
All wrong and falsehood must have their defeat.  
There is no time for nonsense and ignorance in this fight...  
Struggle on! Struggle on! Victory is within sight.  
Don't give up! when it seems that you are down and counted out:  
Get up and continue...  
You're in a Championship Bout!!
